item.name: getList
item.sql: select t.record_id, t.account_id, t.change_type, t.change_amount, t.balance, t.change_time, t.operator, t.remark, t.product_type, t.ORDER_NO, t.SERVICE_LOSS, t4.channel_name, t5.name PayType, t1.name ChangeTypeName, t2.name ProductTypeName from (select RID from (select R.RID, rownum LineNum from (select t.rowid RID from RECEIPT_FUND_RECORD t inner join RECEIPT_ACCOUNT_INFO t1 on t1.account_id=t.account_id where {@t.ChangeType} {&@t.ProductType} {&@t.OrderNO} {&@t.ChangeTime >= to_date($ST,'yyyy-MM-dd')} {&@t.ChangeTime < to_date($ET,'yyyy-MM-dd')+1} {:WhereString} order by t.change_time desc) R where rownum <= { :PS} * { :PI}) where LineNum > { :PS} * ({ :PI} - 1)) tab inner join RECEIPT_FUND_RECORD t on t.rowid = tab.RID left join sys_dictionary t1 on t1.value = t.change_type and t1.type = 'ChangeType' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t2.value = t.product_type and t2.type = 'ProductType' left join RECEIPT_ACCOUNT_INFO t3 on t3.account_id=t.account_id left join DOWN_CHANNEL t4 on t3.down_channel_no=t4.down_channel_no left join sys_dictionary t5 on t3.account_type = t5.value and t5.type = 'PayType' order by t.change_time desc
